Package mockit.integration.testng

Provides integration with TestNG test runners, for versions 5.8+.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Initializer A test listener implementation for TestNG that will properly initialize JMockit before any tests are executed.
JMockitTestNG Simply makes sure that JMockit is initialized before the first TestNG test runs.
 

Package mockit.integration.testng Description

Provides integration with TestNG test runners, for versions 5.8+.

Contains the JMockitTestNG convenience base test class, and the Initializer test listener class that can be specified to TestNG at startup.

Also contains the "startup mock" implementation for integration with the TestNG 5.8+ test runner.
